content.raw:
It's not very evident to me the effect of refraction. Here are two images that I took, the upper one is with refraction set to `0` and the lower one has refraction set to `1`. In both cases, reflection is set to `1` to make the changes more evident.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/469557973-refraction_0.png)
![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/585719843-refraction_1.png)
content.html: It's not very evident to me the effect of refraction. Here are two images that I took, the upper one is with refraction set to 0 and the lower one has refraction set to 1. In both cases, reflection is set to 1 to make the changes more evident.
